title: problem with identification in windows
content:
hi everybody,

i encountered the following problem:

when installing a font-family i created in windows the system could only identify only one the font (like "headline").  
when clickung on the other two ("Swashes" and "NoSwashes"), it always shows "headline" again ...

renaming it would be a solution, but that would tear the family apart.

any ideas???

thx,  
marcus
author: marcus sterz
